posts.title: 第一篇博客
posts.text: 初试第一次用这个东西真有一些不适用啊。我想会逐渐有感觉的 Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 快速开始Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1真有意思 1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
